AboutPageLabels.title: The Little Techie
AboutPageLabels.quote1: Chronicling my adventures in software engineering
AboutPageLabels.desc1: TLT was started as a blog (www.thelittletechie.blogspot.com) on April 2012. Later the dot com (www.thelittletechie.com) was launched on 30<sup>th</sup> January 2015. I redesigned the website using AngularJS and SVG and i call it as Version 2.0 was released on 5 March 2017. A complete redesign of website Version 3.0 into Angular 5 was done and launched on 1st April 2018. It is also a parallax design with animations and also responsive. It's all about design and development.
AboutPageLabels.author: Vivin Antony
AboutPageLabels.desc2: Here I write mostly about software, technology, codings, my development/research works or anything that happens to interests me. If you are looking for something specific, you are at the right place.
AboutPageLabels.quote3: If at first you don't succeed; call it version 1.0
AboutPageLabels.text1: I'm a part designer and coder and some how a poor blogger, but trying hard in blog field to become a professional.
AboutPageLabels.text2: I maintain a healthy balance between functionality and visual imapct in all my work. I believe every piece of design can be a work of art.
AboutPageLabels.text3: I enjoy turning complex problems into simple.
AboutPageLabels.text4: When I'm not coding or pushing pixels, you'll find me hanging out with mah friends. I want to live on Pandora with the Navi. I like to play with Transformers.
